title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: In the All types dialog, the obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are displayed prominently.
EB: They should be displayed with less prominence, distinguishing them from the non-obfuscated classes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the All types dialog. 
2. Scroll through the list of classes.
